price: ߛߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߕߎ߲߰ ߛߎߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߛߋߓߊ߯ ߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
